attributes.action: The NHS needs it's EU staff support them NOW and protect patients!
attributes.additional_details:
Brexit threatens NHS employees. 
We call upon the government to create new legislation to protect our current and future EU workforce.
attributes.background: The NHS depends upon it's diverse workforce. EU nationals work within clinical services, research and at every level. We owe them a debt of gratitude for their professionalism and expertise: patients benefit enormously through their dedication and we cannot afford to lose their contribution.
